name: Onboard.io
headline: Manage & automate customer onboarding and implementation
description: Onboard is a SaaS which automates & streamlines the customer onboarding & implementation process. Easily create dynamic launch plans (customized per customer), which are collaborative with clients and visible to all stakeholders.  Onboard is built for onboarding by a team that spent a better part of the last decade onboarding some of the worlds largest brands.

founders.name: Jeffrey D. Epstein, Founder
founders.description:
Founder of Onboard (https://onboard.io), a B2B SaaS to streamline onboarding for every customer.

Previously founded ZFERRAL INC aka Ambassador (https://getambassador.com), scaled to about 50 people before selling in 2018.

I also enjoy angel investing, stock trading & sports.

founders.name: Will Stevenson, Founder
founders.description:
Over the past 10+ years I've helped early stage B2B SaaS companies scale - managing and building CS, Onboarding, and Support across multiple companies. With three acquisitions under my belt, I founded Onboard, which solves a problem I'm very passionate about - Customer Onboarding. 

We help companies organize, automate, and manage their entire customer onboarding process in one place - providing a better customer experience, saving hours for everyone involved, and reducing churn.

- **Organization:** Standardize and streamline processes, making them consistent across teams.
